thumbnail_preview.label: Play videos by hovering the thumbnails

thumbnail_preview_mute.label: Shift key toggles audio on video thumbnail playback

blacklist_settings.confirm_reset:
You are about to reset your blacklist. It is advised to backup your current blacklist before continuing.

Do you wish to contiue?
blacklist_settings.reset_success:
Blacklist has been reset.

Changes will be applied after a page refresh.
blacklist_settings.confirm_import:
You are about to override your current blacklist. It is advised to backup your current blacklist before continuing.

Do you wish to contiue?
blacklist_settings.import_success:
Your blacklist has been imported with success.

Changes will be applied after a page refresh.
blacklist_settings.import_error: Your blacklist could not be imported because it appears to be invalid.

channel_video_time.label: Display how long the video was uploaded

subscribed_channel_player_ads.label: Allow ads only on videos of subscribed channels

player_quick_controls.label: Enable quick controls
player_quick_controls.thumbnails_title:
Click to download
Right click for options

player_volume_wheel.label: Change volume using the mouse wheel

player_always_visible.label: Video stays always visible while scrolling

player_always_playing.label: Video keeps playing when changing pages

player_hide_end_screen.label: Hide end screen cards on mouse hover

iridium_user_settings.confirm_reset:
You are about to reset your settings. It is advised to backup your current settings before continuing.

Do you wish to contiue?
iridium_user_settings.reset_success:
Settings have been reset.

Changes will be applied after a page refresh.
iridium_user_settings.confirm_import:
You are about to override your current settings. It is advised to backup your current settings before continuing.

Do you wish to contiue?
iridium_user_settings.import_success:
Your settings have been imported with success.

Changes will be applied after a page refresh.
iridium_user_settings.import_error: Your settings could not be imported because they appear to be invalid.

iridium_language.confirm_save:
You are about to replace your extension language settings.

Do you wish to continue?
iridium_language.save_success:
New language saved successfully.

Changes will be applied after a page refresh.
iridium_language.save_error: The new language could not be saved because it appears to be invalid.
